Fully agree with @AamerAnwar
This was what my son did on exam results day many years ago. He was fine, my car was not.
The moral of the story is, don't panic whatever your results are today. Exam results are not the biggest issue, and life does have a way of working out https://t.co/rvC3ZnU4zC
Wise words - do not get too hung up on exam results, there's a whole world awaiting you out there. https://t.co/iTxQHeU14L
